transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, haan ji sir. Mai actually mai actually ye bol rahi thi aapko ki maine check kara hai, maine baat bhi kari hai. Mai apne side se internal concern erase kar rahi hu, thik hai? Wo aapko wapas se live karke de denge, uska koi issue nahi hai. Thik hai? Baki yaha pe na mere ko call karne ke alawa bhi aapne 9696 pe call kar diya tha customer care wale pe. 
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm, koi faida nahi.
Executive: To haan haan to actually kya hai ki abhi aapke customer care na hum hi ho chuke hai sir. Matlab aap call karoge to hamare paas hi aapka number aata hai, matlab aapka call aata hai. Thik hai? To meri already aapse discussion mera ho chuka tha to isliye aapka call answer nahi ho paya. Thik hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To abhi mai yaha se ye jo concern hai jo aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai, yaha se ye wala to mai close kar du na 9696 ka call, actually directly to hum coordinate kar hi rahe hai is cheez se related. 
Customer: Haan lekin close ek baar isko live hoga ki kab tak hoga ye?
Executive: Ye itni jaldi nahi hoga sir. Abhi mai concern erase karungi, fir us pe team kaam karegi fir wo aapko live karke degi. Matlab aaj mai karke jaungi kal tak aapko update aayega, thik hai? Aur ye jo aapka concern open hua hai already hum is cheez se related to matlab coordinate kar hi rahe hai directly. Right? Aap customer care pe bhi call karoge to wo call hume degi hi aata hai. Kyuki abhi aapke customer care hum hi ho chuke hai ya to mai uthaungi aapka call ya to Ruchi call answer karegi aapka. To it's better hai ki aap hume directly call karo hamare number pe. Mera bhi number hai aapke paas, Ruchi ka bhi number mai aapko ek baar forward kar deti hu. Usko bhi aap directly call kar sakte ho, thik hai? To abhi ye wala mai close kar rahi hu yaha se jo 9696 pe aapne call kiya tha. Aapke paas ek mere feedback ke liye na ek mail receive hoga client satisfaction ka. To waha pe bas aap yes de dijiyega. Thik hai? Kyuki wo ke liye aata hai. 
Customer: Aise hone ke tak close kar dete kal ek baar thoda ho jaye live ek baar.
Executive: To isko open karne se bhi kya kya hi matlab hai sir wo to hum aapko waise bhi kara ke denge. Wo to directly aap mere ko bolte tab bhi mai aapko kara ke deti.
Customer: Nahi to ye kiya kaun? Kyu hua uska reason to kitni der me pata ho hi gaya hoga na?
Executive: Nahi nahi uska reason wahi wahi reason pata karne ke liye hume na mere paas concern erase karna padega mere ko internally. To aap mere ko aaj aaj ka time do, mai aaj open karke jaungi. Kal tak mere ko update aa jayega mai aapko update kar dungi kya solution aaya hai. Thik hai? Baki hum directly aap mere se coordinate kijiyega mere number pe. Baki koi issue hai to bataiye.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai? To ye mai close karungi to waha pe bas aap satisfy kar dijiyega sir yes. Aisa na ho aap waha pe no de do to wapas se concern open ho jayega aapka ye. 
Customer: Concern open rehne dijiye na tab tak kal tak pehle dekhe to kya chal raha hai usme ho raha nahi ho raha concern close ho gaya matlab.
Executive: Wo to aap waise bhi sir wo to aap waise bhi mere se directly coordinate karke kar sakte ho na aisa nahi hai ki ye open rahega tabhi aapka problem resolve hoga. 
Customer: To sabke knowledge me hona chahiye ki kaam hua hai nahi. Mai agar agree kar diya to ho gaya.
Executive: Ye sabke knowledge ke liye nahi sir sir sir ye sabke liye knowledge ke liye nahi hota. Ye sirf hamare liye hota hai jo aapka account manager hota hai jo aap jo unke manager hote hai ye sirf unke liye hota hai ki pata chale ki client ko koi issue hua hai aap client ko call karo. To 9696 sirf iske liye hota hai ki aap us pe call karoge jaise abhi kya hai abhi agar aap hume call nahi karte ho to hume pata nahi chalta ya fir aap mere number pe call karoge kabhi by chance hum aapka call nahi uthate hai just because of ki hum busy hai to waha pe hume pata nahi chal pata hai ki aapko koi issue hai lekin 9696 pe call karne se na mindset ye clear rehta hai ki haan client ko koi issue hai isliye client ne 9696 pe call kiya hai customer care pe. To wo bas hamare liye hota hai ki hume pata chale ki client ko koi issue hai aap call karo client ko. Hmm. Thik hai? Aur aisa nahi hai ki aap agar ye open karenge tabhi aapka issue resolve hoga. Itna to trust kar sakte hai na sir aap mere upar itne time se hum saath kaam kar rahe hai. Hmm. Right? To aap bataiye ki abhi mai close haan mai abhi close karungi to aapke paas wo mail jayega to us pe bas aap positive aap dijiyega aapko negative dena hai to wo pehle hi bata dijiyega ki mai close nahi karungi fir. 
Customer: Thik hai thik hai karwa ke do isko pehle ek baar.
Executive: Haan mai to matlab aap mujhe clear to bataiye kya karna hai isko close karu concern ki kya karu bataiye. Kar du na? Abhi kar deti hu haan kar deti hu directly aap mere se coordinate karna. Mai concern open karke aapko screenshot deke jaungi sir ki haan open kar diya hai kal tak update aa jayega. Thik hai? Haan to abhi aapne kar rahi hu aap please wo dekh ke feedback de dijiyega bas. Iske alawa to koi dikkat nahi hai na aapko ye trusting ke alawa. 
Customer: Nahi nahi sabse badi dikkat yahi ho gayi na kal se pata nahi parso do teen din se isme lead hi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Accha. Lead bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Madam meri bol rahi thi ki pata nahi kya jab se isme koi lead hi nahi aa rahi hai. 
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Mai khud dekh raha hu ki pichle week me 245 tha fir 175 hua fir 75 hua is samay aaj to ye date me lagbhag 45 hua hai lead hi nahi aa rahi din pe din ghatti chali aa rahi hai.
Executive: Accha. To ye hum maine kal bhi aapse discuss kiya tha kal bhi aap mujhe bata dete to mai already discuss kar chuki hoti aage. 
Customer: Nahi mujhe aaj aaj hi pata chala na aaj maine jab ye live hua tab maine pura ispe analysis kiya tab mujhe chala lead to bahut lead hi nahi aa rahi hai. Hmm. Thik hai baki wo CA CA se apni baat ki thi aapne? 
Executive: Nahi aaj baat kiya change karne ke liye thoda wo document wagera manga hai. Haan matlab us us tarike se hi baat ki thi na sir aapne ki haan same GST pe matlab same us pe. 
Customer: Haan haan bola bola ho jayega naam change. Ho jayega na? Haan haan yahi mai bol rahi thi. 
Executive: Uske liye mujhe document manga hai na koi bhi ek document chahiye. Haan wo to chahiye hoga sir wo to government ke according jo details chahiye hota hai wo de denge to wo change karke de denge. Hmm hmm hmm. Hmm. Chalo thik hai karo. 
Executive: Haan ye mai mail karke aapko deke jaungi kal tak mai aapko update deti hu jaise hi update aata hai thik hai baki aap mere ko directly call karke coordinate kijiyega. Mere ko pata chal gaya hai ki aapka ye issue hai to hum directly bhi coordinate karke isko resolve kar sakte hai. Thik hai? Thik hai. Okay okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know when the issue will resolve.

- Wants to know why leads are decreasing.

- Wants to change the GST details.



Resolution:

- Executive will erase the concern internally.

- Executive will provide an update by tomorrow.

- Executive will send a mail for feedback.

- Executive will provide a screenshot after opening concern.

- Asked the customer to share documents for GST change.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, subscription, resolution
